reference.shortdesc: An appendix element references a topic or map as an appendix within a book.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The appendix element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how two appendix elements are used to create two appendices for a publication: <bookmap> <booktitle> <mainbooktitle>Developers guide to the widget</mainbooktitle> </booktitle> <frontmatter> <!-- TOC, preface, and other front matter --> </frontmatter> <chapter href="introduction.dita"> <!-- Introductory material about the widget --> </chapter> <chapter href="extending.dita"> <!-- How to extend the widget widget --> </chapter> <appendix href="intro.dita"> <topicref href="caring.dita"/> <topicref href="feeding.dita"/> </appendix> <appendix href="setup.dita"> <topicref href="prereq.dita"/> <topicref href="download.dita"/> </appendix> </bookmap>
